verses.t: O God{H430}, my heart{H3820} is fixed{H3559}; I will sing{H7891} and give praise{H2167}, even with my glory{H3519}.
Awake{H5782}, psaltery{H5035} and harp{H3658}: I myself will awake{H5782} early{H7837}.
I will praise{H3034} Lordthee, O {H3068}, among the people{H5971}: and I will sing praises{H2167} unto thee among the nations{H3816}.
For thy mercy{H2617} is great{H1419} above the heavens{H8064}: and thy truth{H571} reacheth unto the clouds{H7834}.clouds: or, skies
Be thou exalted{H7311}, O God{H430}, above the heavens{H8064}: and thy glory{H3519} above all the earth{H776};
That thy beloved{H3039} may be delivered{H2502}: save{H3467} with thy right hand{H3225}, and answer{H6030} me.
God{H430} hath spoken{H1696} in his holiness{H6944}; I will rejoice{H5937}, I will divide{H2505} Shechem{H7927}, and mete out{H4058} the valley{H6010} of Succoth{H5523}.
Gilead{H1568} is mine; Manasseh{H4519} is mine; Ephraim{H669} also is the strength{H4581} of mine head{H7218}; Judah{H3063} is my lawgiver{H2710};
Moab{H4124} is my washpot{H5518}; over Edom{H123} will I cast out{H7993} my shoe{H5275}; over Philistia{H6429} will I triumph{H7321}.
Who will bring{H2986} me into the strong{H4013} city{H5892}? who will lead{H5148} me into Edom{H123}?
Wilt not thou, O God{H430}, who hast cast us off{H2186}? and wilt not thou, O God{H430}, go forth{H3318} with our hosts{H6635}?
Give{H3051} us help{H5833} from trouble{H6862}: for vain{H7723} is the help{H8668} of man{H120}.
Through God{H430} we shall do{H6213} valiantly{H2428}: for he it is that shall tread down{H947} our enemies{H6862}.
